scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified by the scroll as 'Ieremias', is depicted with a golden halo, looking upwards and touching his head. He is dressed in a blue tunic and a red mantle. To his right, an angel with red and white wings, also with a halo, stands and gestures towards the prophet. The background features a blue tapestry with gold ornamentation and a grey architectural element with arches above. The scene is set on a green checkered ground.
